FuncDef: This command associates policies to control the leaking of GRT routes into the associated VPRN.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies route policy names, up to 64 characters, or a policy logical expression, up to 255 characters. Values-plcy-or-long-expr: policy-name | long-expr.
Specifies up to four route policy names, up to 64 characters, or a policy logical expression, up to 64 characters long. Values-plcy-or-expr: policy-name | expr.
